snippet: A single mother who used to work 15-hour days thought earning a paycheck was her top priority for her family, but when her eldest was suspended from school, she made a change.
abstract: Children’s Aid Society provides gift cards so that Jennifer Brito of Washington Heights could buy Christmas gifts and clothing for her children.
lead_paragraph: A single mother who used to work 15-hour days thought earning a paycheck was her top priority for her family, but when her eldest was suspended from school, she made a change.

headline.seo: Putting Career Aside to Raise Responsible Children
headline.main: Leaving Job to Raise Better Children, but Then Feeling the Financial Strain
headline.print_headline: Leaving Job to Raise Better Children, But Then Feeling the Financial Strain

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
